profile.headline: Marketing Executive
profile.location: New York, New York, United States of America
profile.summary:
* Driven and experienced marketing executive with expert proficiency in providing unsurpassed leadership and growth in dynamic, fast paced, competitive environments. Experienced in developing and executing innovative and successful marketing strategies

* Skilled in the successful application of digital marketing tactics that enable sustained growth, expand revenue, elevate brand awareness, and improve customer acquisition. Well versed in delivering results in digital marketing, SEO, paid advertising, digital strategy, analytics, and go-to-market tactics

* Accomplished brand strategist with a history of leading initiatives that spark significant gains in efficiency, productivity, and operational effectiveness, positioning organizations and teams for growth

positionHistory.title: Director of Social Media
positionHistory.description:
Develop communication processes and systems to increase subscriber engagement, inspire curiosity, increase customer adoption rates and improve subscriber retention rates
Responsible for building social media marketing strategy, goals, tactics and metrics of success to support business goals and initiatives.
Organize information and resources from marketing teams and programming partners into an overarching strategy for customer engagement.
Oversee social media response messaging to improve customer experience.
Create engagement strategies and implement tactics to foster positive consumer brand experiences to inspire brand advocacy.
Create internal and external brand advocacy initiatives to empower employees and consumers to discover and share brand related content.
Build reporting models to highlight key performance indicators. 
Investigate and develop concepts to socialize company products and services. 
Managed multiple social media monitoring, publishing and reporting tools.

profile.headline: Azure Cloud & Identity Strategist | ex-Microsoft | Technical & Professional Global Community Builder, Leader & Advisor | Azure Certification Evangelist | Professional Speaker & Podcaster | Endurance Cyclist
profile.location: West Bloomfield Township, Michigan, United States of America
profile.summary:
Principal Consultant - 19 years of infrastructure and architectural consulting experience with a current emphasis on Identity Strategies and Cloud Migration and Modernization. Incorporate presentation skills  (Microsoft Certified Trainer (MCT) since 1998) to CXO audiences, global events, and to internal Microsoft audiences. Passionate about learning, growth and development for Microsoft, our Customers and Partners. Enjoy identifying gaps or white spaces and creating/providing opportunities to fulfil those.

PROGRAM MANAGEMENT & LEADERSHIP
•	Orchestrate and Led the WW Identity Technical Community within Microsoft of nearly 2 dozens lead roles and over 3,500 members worldwide. Curated and Created content across multiple forms of community calls, technical podcasts and learning resource guides.
•	Envisioned and Co-Led an internal Microsoft Event called SPARK, which was a grassroots effort "for the field, and by the field" delivering level 3-400 technical sessions from real world experiences. The most recent event more than doubled the first event, yielding over 30,000 live attendees in a week with nearly 600 unique sessions delivered.
•	Created internal virtual event (and now on YouTube) to fill another white space of certification preparation readiness called Certification Exam Rapid Training (C.E.R.T) for sessions that used to exist at Microsoft internal and external conventions - https://aka.ms/YouTube/CERT 
•	Mentored at scale by creating an internal group for Principal Consultants to bring top leaders to the conversation, alternating sessions with interviewing top leaders for their history and perspectives and also gaining advice from others' thought leadership principles.
•	Contributed innovative ideas as a committee advisory member for two other Microsoft internal Technical Leadership groups, shaping their future content and direction.

positionHistory.title: Solutions Director Cloud Platform
positionHistory.description: Pre-sales solution architecture along with selling from within large accounts.  In addition to cloud adoption, my primary interest is in Identity thought leadership. This is an ever-growing landscape of possibilities to provide an "identity fabric", which is Microsoft's latest theme. Working with companies to reduce risks, add business value and keep all of their customers, internal and external, happy, is very rewarding from a career perspective and also to our customers.

In my free time I created and delivered Azure Certification Preparation aka.ms/Azure/CERT .

profile.headline: 🟠  Context Operating Systems for GTM | Amplify Your Taste & Scale Expertise
profile.location: New York, New York, United States of America
profile.summary:
Taste is the last moat. Context is king. 

I build GTM operating systems that make AI create like you do.

These systems amplify your taste and expertise so you can make decisions faster with better intelligence that compounds over time. 

You never have to solve the same problem twice and it gets smarter the more you use it.

We take your call transcripts, internal docs, and more and transform it into a knowledge base which acts the back bone of your operating system using an our proprietary multi-agent approach and schema. 

Check my out my recent content to learn more and feel free to dm me with questions :)

profile.headline: Co-Founder @ SwiftDial.ai | The AI Growth Studio | Building AI workflows that elevate your team | M.Sc. (Econ.)
profile.summary:
I spent 5+ years building international markets from €3B corporations to startups, then watched teams waste 80% of their time on manual busywork while revenue targets got missed. So I decided to solve it.

THE BREAKING POINT

At Huhtamäki (€3B publicly listed), I was managing Nordic accounts while coordinating with supply chain teams across Europe. At Nature Line Cutlery, I built markets from scratch in UK, Germany, Spain, Italy, France. But the one thing I always thought about is that the processes seemed broken.

Every day, high-performing sales professionals spend hours on manual data gathering, jumping between disconnected systems, and struggling with unclear targeting while the actual relationship building and deal closing—the work that drive revenue—get squeezed into whatever time was left.

MY HYPOTHESIS

I believe there is a better way. That AI and agentic workflows can eliminate the busywork entirely, letting sales teams focus on what they do best: building relationships and closing deals.

MY BACKGROUND

Masters degree in economics, majoring in strategic business development (4.0 GPA), with 5+ years international B2B sales experience from €3B corporations to startups.

WHAT I BUILD FOR COMPANIES

→  Foundational datasets that allow you to build world-class sales and marketing functions by focusing on what matters most - high-leverage tasks that create value

→  Agentic systems that track every signal and engagement across your entire target market so it's crystal clear where prospects are in the customer journey and who the high-priority customers are - without jumping between 10 different tools (think: 1 dynamically updated list to call)

→ Automations that keep your CRM clean and up-to-date with correct data - your sales and marketing team should never spend time cleaning your CRM

→  Secure MCP servers that allow executive teams to connect with different tools and layers of context to start generating real insights

The three problems killing your sales performance:

→ You don't know who to target, where to find them, or what to say
→ Sales and marketing operate in disconnected silos
→ You're flying blind without integrated tracking systems

If you want to transform your sales operations from manual chaos to automated intelligence, let's talk.

profile.headline: Building PREDICT | The OS for predictable new business sales.
profile.summary:
Die erfolgreichsten B2B Unternehmen wachsen hocheffizient und profitabel, weil sie vorhersehbar qualifizierte Leads generieren und in der Lage sind, diese innerhalb von Wochen statt Monaten in Neukunden zu verwandeln.

Hier ist die Wahrheit… 

In den letzten 4 Jahren haben wir die Vertriebsprozesse von über 432 DACH B2B Unternehmen mit erklärungsbedürftigen Lösungen digitalisiert & optimiert und herausgefunden, dass die erfolgreichsten alle die folgenden Gemeinsamkeiten haben:

1. Niedrige CAC
2. Signalbasierte Leadgenerierung
3. Kurzer Sales Cycle und hohe LTV

Hier kommen wir ins Spiel:

Ich bin Fabio – CEO und Co-Founder von PREDICT. 

Wir nutzen Signale der Zielgruppe in Kombination mit KI, um die Kalender von über 52 B2B Unternehmen mit qualifizierten Meetings zu füllen und ihre Sales Cycles auf Wochen zu verkürzen.

OHNE Cold Calling oder einen einzigen Cent in Werbung zu investieren.

Für wen ist das also gedacht?

Das hier ist für B2B Unternehmen mit erklärungsbedürftigen Lösungen, die folgende Probleme kennen:

→ zu wenig qualifizierte Meetings

→ keine Kontrolle über den Sales Zyklus

→ von Cold Calling über Events und Online Werbung, alles schon erfolglos probiert

→ sie leben von Bestandskunden oder Empfehlungen

→ gefühlt jeder Deal wird von Budgetkürzungen geblockt

→ Umsätze schwanken stark von Monat zu Monat

→ Vertrieb ist mehr Glück und Bauchgefühl als ein vorhersehbarer Prozess

→ Moral im Vertriebsteam nimmt ständig ab

Wenn du dich hier wiederfindest - schick mir eine DM, und wir machen eine kostenlose Pipeline Analyse, um die wichtigsten Hebel zur Optimierung zu identifizieren.

Case Studies und Testimonials findest du auf unserer Website: www.predict-ability.com

positionHistory.title: CEO & Founder
positionHistory.description:
Als CEO leite ich ein 8-köpfiges Team und helfe B2B-Unternehmen, durch signalbasierten Vertrieb und optimierte Sales-Prozesse vorhersehbares Wachstum zu erzielen.

Meine Kernverantwortlichkeiten umfassen:

→ Aufbau profitabler GTM-Motions für Kunden
→ Implementierung von KI & Daten in Vertriebsstrategien
→ Verantwortung für Sales, Marketing, Business Development und Finanzen

Wenn du mehr darüber erfahren möchtest, was wir bei PREDICT tun, oder ein Teil davon werden möchtest, sende mir eine Nachricht.

positionHistory.description:
Multi-6-stelligen Deal (über 250.000€ ACV) geclosed, umfangreiche Workshops gehalten und erreichte einen Verkaufszyklus von nur 5 Monaten.

→ Akquise und Betreuung von Enterprise-Kunden, um maßgeschneiderte Lösungen zu implementieren und langfristige Beziehungen aufzubauen
→ Durchführung persönlicher Treffen und Workshops, um Kundenbedürfnisse zu verstehen und effektive Strategien zu entwickeln
→ Zusammenarbeit mit C-Level-Entscheidern, um strategische Partnerschaften zu fördern und umzusetzen

positionHistory.title: Account Executive
positionHistory.description:
2 End-Stage Opportunities innerhalb der ersten 4 Monate die durch eigenes Prospecting geöffnet wurden. Beide wurden 3-4 Wochen nach meinem Ende bei Braze erfolgreich abgeschlossen. 

→ Akquise und Beratung von SMB & MidMarket-Kunden, in Zentral-Europa
→ Aufbau eigener Pipeline durch Kaltakquise, Office Drop-ins und mehr
→ Top 3 in Pipeline Activity im Europa Team in meinem ersten Quartal (trotz einem Monat Onboarding)

positionHistory.title: Team Lead Account-Management

Betreute und beriet als Team Lead Customer Success  über 155 Accounts und generierte innerhalb von 11 Monaten >3M€ (cash collected).

→ Beratung von über 155 B2B-CEOs und Vertriebsleitern, um Multi-Millionen-Pipelines aufzubauen und den Sales Cycles zu verkürzen
→ Aufbau interner Prozesse, um Churn zu reduzieren und die Kommunikation mit dem Vertrieb zu verbessern
→ Leitung, Schulung und Aufbau des Support Teams mit 5 Mitarbeitern und 2 zusätzlichen Customer Success Managern
